verses.name: Genesis 11:25
verses.text: And Nahor lived after he begat Terah an hundred and nineteen years, and begat sons and daughters.

verses.name: Genesis 11:26
verses.text: And Terah lived seventy years, and begat Abram, Nahor, and Haran.

verses.name: Genesis 11:27
verses.text: Now these are the generations of Terah: Terah begat Abram, Nahor, and Haran; and Haran begat Lot.

verses.name: Genesis 11:28
verses.text: And Haran died before his father Terah in the land of his nativity, in Ur of the Chaldees.

verses.name: Genesis 11:29
verses.text: And Abram and Nahor took them wives: the name of Abram’s wife was Sarai; and the name of Nahor’s wife, Milcah, the daughter of Haran, the father of Milcah, and the father of Iscah.
